metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14406 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference was discovered in sync_buffer in interface.c in mpglibDBL, as used in MP3Gain version 1.5.2. The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault and application crash, which leads to remote denial of service.

criterions.comment: mp3gain: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
